title: Set alias for columns in dataset but in expression builder, old column names are shown when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that were set for the columns
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the aliases that were set for the columns should be displayed
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset, such as 'column1'
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset
4. Open the expression builder
5. Select the dataset in the expression builder and observe the column names displayed
